Jackson.McKellar\u2013Sipes Regional Airport: McKellar–Sipes Regional Airport (IATA: MKL, ICAO: KMKL, FAA LID: MKL) is a public use airport located four nautical miles (7 km) west of the central business district of Jackson, a city in Madison County, Tennessee, United States. It is owned by the city and county. The airport is mostly used for general aviation, but was also served by one commercial airline, subsidized by the Essential Air Service program.
